name: part_010
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs the song 'brave heart'.
MC section where Fubuki talks about the songs she just performed and makes several announcements.

subtitles.original: 魚の
subtitles.english: Fish's...

subtitles.original: ドシャ降りにも
subtitles.english: Even in a downpour

subtitles.original: きっと止むから
subtitles.english: it will surely stop.

subtitles.original: Show me your brave heart
subtitles.english: Show me your brave heart

subtitles.original: つかめ　眩しい明日を
subtitles.english: Grasp the dazzling tomorrow

subtitles.original: 守れ　愛する人を
subtitles.english: Protect the ones you love

subtitles.original: たくましい自分に　なれるさ
subtitles.english: You can become a strong person

subtitles.original: 壊せ　弱気な君を
subtitles.english: Break your timid self

subtitles.original: 崩せ　ぶつかる壁を
subtitles.english: Destroy the walls you hit

subtitles.original: 熱い鼓動　武器になるから
subtitles.english: Because your hot heartbeat will become your weapon

subtitles.original: Believe in your heart
subtitles.english: Believe in your heart

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: 本当皆さん、今日はありがとね！
subtitles.english: Really everyone, thank you for today!

subtitles.original: ありがとうだよー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、2曲続けて聴いていただきました！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yes! So, you've heard two songs in a row! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: はい、『涙の種、笑顔の花』ですね。
subtitles.english: Yes, that was "Seed of Tears, Flower of Smiles".

subtitles.original: 白上1期生のライブの時には『空色デイズ』を歌わせていただいたんですけど、
subtitles.english: At my 1st gen live, I sang "Sorairo Days",

subtitles.original: まあそれも相まって今回は『涙の種、笑顔の花』、しょこたん大好きです！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: so combined with that, this time I chose "Seed of Tears, Flower of Smiles". I love Shokotan! Yay!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、『brave heart』は一昨年になっちゃうのかな？
subtitles.english: And as for "brave heart", was it the year before last?

subtitles.original: もう、白上のお誕生日イベントでですね、『Butter-Fly』を歌わせていただきましたので、
subtitles.english: At my birthday event, I sang "Butter-Fly",

subtitles.original: 今回は『brave heart』仕様ということで、皆さん進化しましたか？大丈夫ですか？(笑)
subtitles.english: so this time it was the "brave heart" version. Did you guys evolve? Are you okay? (laughs)

subtitles.original: はい！では次で最後の曲なんですけども、ここでお知らせです！
subtitles.english: Yes! The next one will be the last song, but first, an announcement!

subtitles.original: なんと！なんと！ただいま開催中の富士急ハイランドさんにて、
subtitles.english: Wow! Wow! At Fuji-Q Highland, which is currently holding an event,

subtitles.original: 10月5日、今日から10日まで、の期間限定で白上の限定ボイスが聞けちゃいまーす！
subtitles.english: from today, October 5th until the 10th, you can hear my limited-time voice for a limited period!

subtitles.original: そしてなんと！メリーゴーランドも白上の『Say!ファンファーレ!』が流れちゃいますので、ぜひ皆さん来てください！お願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: And what's more! "Say! Fanfare!" will be playing on the carousel too, so please come visit! Please!

subtitles.original: そしてもう一個！なんと！なんと！明日、
subtitles.english: And one more thing! Wow! Tomorrow,

subtitles.original: 明日はですね、白上の誕生日、後夜祭ということで、
subtitles.english: since tomorrow is my birthday after-party,

subtitles.original: Live2Dの、頭かな？横かな？なんだろうな？アクセサリーが追加されます！
subtitles.english: some accessories will be added to my Live2D model! On the head? On the side? I wonder what they are?

subtitles.original: そして、グッズも明日告知させていただこうと思いますので、よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: And I'll also be announcing some goods tomorrow, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: 明日も見るんじゃぞい！
subtitles.english: Make sure to watch tomorrow too!

subtitles.original: ではでは、本当に本当に次で最後の曲でございます。
subtitles.english: Now then, the next song really, really is the last one.

subtitles.original: それでは、聴いてください。『Say!ファンファーレ!』
subtitles.english: Now, please listen. "Say! Fanfare!"

subtitles.original: 皆さん！最後の曲『Say!ファンファーレ!』行きますよー！うっ！と！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Here we go with the last song, "Say! Fanfare!"! Utto!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ハイ！ハイ！うっ！とっ！そっ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Hi! Hi! Utto so!

subtitles.original:
Say!ファンファーレ!
作詞・作曲・編曲：tilt-six (Foxtail-Grass Studio)
subtitles.english:
Say! Fanfare!
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: tilt-six (Foxtail-Grass Studio)

subtitles.original: Are you ready?
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: はーっとひといきお茶ですよ
subtitles.english: Take a deep breath and have some tea

subtitles.original: （はい！どうぞ！）いつもの場所から
subtitles.english: (Here you go!) From the usual place

subtitles.original: 元気にせーのでご挨拶（おはこんですー！）始めましょう！
subtitles.english: Greet everyone energetically on the count of three (Oha-kon!) Let's begin!

subtitles.original: お喋りをしてゲームと過ごす　そんな毎日が愛しくて
subtitles.english: Chatting and playing games, I cherish every day like that

subtitles.original: あれもこれも手を出したくなり勝ちです
subtitles.english: I tend to want to try this and that

subtitles.original: 歌とかステージはまだまだ恥ずかしいけど
subtitles.english: Singing and being on stage is still a bit embarrassing

subtitles.original: 支え合ってほら届けますよ　この声を
subtitles.english: Supporting each other, look, I'll deliver this voice

subtitles.original: Say！　ほらその顔上げて　みんなで手を取れば　バンザイ！
subtitles.english: Say! Look up, and if we all take each other's hands, banzai!

subtitles.original: まだまだ道の中途　世界を変えよう
subtitles.english: We're still in the middle of our journey, let's change the world

subtitles.original: Say！　ほらお仕事も　止まらない全力ですから
subtitles.english: Say! Look, even work, I'm going at full power without stopping

subtitles.original: 夢を書き換えたら　追いかけ続けよう　共に繋ぐファンファーレ
subtitles.english: If we rewrite our dreams, let's keep chasing them, the fanfare that connects us together

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ハイ！ハイ！うっ！とっ！そっ！
subtitles.english: Yay! Hi! Hi! Utto so!

subtitles.original: （フー！）せーの！Go Go Let's Go!
subtitles.english: (Fu-!) Ready! Go Go Let's Go!

subtitles.original: ちょーっとやらかした時でも（もう大丈夫！）気持ち切り替えて
subtitles.english: Even when I mess up a little (It's okay now!) Switch your feelings

subtitles.original: ぼーっとしちゃう昼下がりは（昼コンですよー！）背伸びをして
subtitles.english: In the early afternoon when I'm spacing out (Hiru-kon!) Stretch a little

subtitles.original: お腹減ったらすぐモグモグと　お茶の合間すこんなおやつで
subtitles.english: When I'm hungry, I eat immediately, snacks like this during tea time
